title: Willow
actors: Val Kilmer, Joanne Whalley, Warwick Davis
plot: A young dwarf farmer is chosen to undertake a perilous journey in order to protect a special baby from an evil queen. Along the way, he teams up with a disgraced swordsman to defeat the evil sorceress.
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 1 win & 13 nominations total
